title: Myint Maung (politician)
text:
Myint Maung is a <a href="Burma">Burmese</a> politician who is currently serving as <a href="Chief%20Minister">Chief Minister</a> of <a href="Taninthayi%20Region">Taninthayi Region</a> and <a href="Taninthayi%20Region%20Hluttaw">Taninthayi Region Parliament</a> <a href="Member%20of%20Parliament">MP</a> for <a href="Kawthaung%20Township">Kawthaung Township</a> Constituency No. 2.
He previously served as the <a href="Ministry%20of%20Natural%20Resources%20and%20Environmental%20Conservation%20%28Myanmar%29">Minister of Natural Resource and Environment</a> for <a href="Taninthayi%20Region">Taninthayi Region</a> from 2016 to 2019. Myint Maung is also the NLD secretary for Tanintharyi Region. He was appointed as acting Chief Minister for Tanintharyi Region on 11 March 2019 after former chief minister <a href="Lei%20Lei%20Maw">Lei Lei Maw</a> was arrested on charges of corruption. On 10 February 2021, in the aftermath of the <a href="2021%20Myanmar%20coup%20d%27%C3%A9tat">2021 Myanmar coup d'état</a>, Myint Maung was arrested and detained during a late-night raid of his residence.
